analysisEngineMetaData.name: de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.opennlp.OpenNlpParser
analysisEngineMetaData.description: OpenNLP parser. The parser ignores existing POS tags and internally creates new ones. However, these tags are only added as annotation if explicitly requested via #PARAM_WRITE_POS.
analysisEngineMetaData.copyright: Copyright 2010-2015 Ubiquitous Knowledge Processing (UKP) Lab Technische Universit√§t Darmstadt

configurationParameter.name: language
configurationParameter.description: Use this language instead of the document language to resolve the model.

configurationParameter.name: modelVariant
configurationParameter.description: Override the default variant used to locate the model.

configurationParameter.name: modelLocation
configurationParameter.description: Load the model from this location instead of locating the model automatically.

configurationParameter.name: POSMappingLocation
configurationParameter.description: Load the part-of-speech tag to UIMA type mapping from this location instead of locating the mapping automatically.

configurationParameter.name: ConstituentMappingLocation
configurationParameter.description: Location of the mapping file for constituent tags to UIMA types.

configurationParameter.name: internTags
configurationParameter.description:
Use the String#intern() method on tags. This is usually a good idea to avoid spaming the heap with thousands of strings representing only a few different tags.

Default: true

configurationParameter.name: printTagSet
configurationParameter.description:
Log the tag set(s) when a model is loaded.

Default: false

configurationParameter.name: writePOS
configurationParameter.description:
Sets whether to create or not to create POS tags. The creation of constituent tags must be turned on for this to work.

Default: true

configurationParameter.name: writePennTree
configurationParameter.description:
If this parameter is set to true, each sentence is annotated with a PennTree-Annotation, containing the whole parse tree in Penn Treebank style format.

Default: false
